Cutie's ghost appeared neither seen or heard on the battlefield.

Cutie: Another evil creature. I am not like that creature Starscream I 
am now one with the Matrix so I cannot stop him, but the rule that 
cannot be broken can be bent.

He raises his hand and attempts to drain some of ?????'s energy and 
channel it into Mutate's auto repair system.

OOC: In other words if he isn't being worked on by Christmas I'll 
bring him back.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> In the debris from the battle with the Decepticons an owl awakens. 
(Thanks
> to all who tried to help.) Ice forced herself to stand. "What the 
pit is
> going on?" she asked herself scanning the situation. She heard the 
intruder
> calling out to the Maximals. In other situations she would've 
stepped in but
> the mutant was still weak from her mind wars with Surgital. 
transforming to
> her robot mode she extended the owl wings on her back and flew 
skyward. The
> Maximals were capable of handling themselves. Her former friends 
didn't need
> her anymore. Setting a course for the mutants home she flew north. 
She hoped
> Lunarpine would be there to comfort her.

the

Maximal

begins to

vortex,

explosions.

from

they
